scripts.vault: npm run vault:start && echo 'Unseal by running `npm run vault:unseal` or in browser: http://localhost:8200/'
scripts.vault:unseal: echo 'You can also unseal in browser: http://localhost:8200/' && vault operator unseal
scripts.start: npm run vault:login && npm run vault:generate:token && npm run vault:generate:wrapToken && npm run vault:logout && nightwatch && npm run cleanup && npm run chrome:zombies:kill
scripts.chrome:zombies: ps auxw|grep '/statements-downloader/node_modules/chromedriver' | grep -v grep || echo 'No zombie chromedrive processes found'
scripts.chrome:zombies:kill: npm run chrome:zombies && ps auxw|grep '/statements-downloader/node_modules/chromedriver' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill && npm run chrome:zombies
